welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Schloss Holte-Stukenbrock, a charming city known for its beautiful nature trails and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all the city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bielefeld Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guetersloh Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paderborn/lippstadt Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paderborn/lippstadt Airport, primarily used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.
